entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Wabush Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:15 AM AST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 18 February 2023
